content: You don't just go to the cinema to watch films. Rather, you go to the cinema in order to laugh and cry together with two hundred people.
translations: ita:Non Ã¨ solo andare al cinema a vedere i film. Piuttosto, si va al cinema per ridere e piangere insieme a duecento persone
